sourcesContent:
const globalTheme = {
    switchWidth: "40px",
    switchHeight: "20px",
    switchPadding: "3px",
    colorContrastLow: "#d3d3d4",
    colorWhite: "#fff",
    switchColorPrimary: "#302C40",
    switchAnimationDuration: "0.2s",
    gradient: "linear-gradient(122deg, rgba(128,74,216,1) 0%, rgba(98,75,217,1) 100%)",
    colorGreen: "#5DC399",
    colorGray: "#adadad",
}

export const lightTheme = {
     primary: "#FFF",
     secondary: "#F8F8F8",
     textColory: "#585280",
     header: "#585280",
     headerNumber: "#FFF",
     activeMenu: "#585288",
     ...globalTheme
}

export const darkTheme = {
    primary: "#302C40",
    secondary: "#2C2839",
    textColory: "#FFF",
    header: "#FFF",
    headerNumber: "#585280",
    activeMenu: "#FFF",
    ...lightTheme
}
